# Introduction

The CPU 410 has two internal PN/Ethernet interfaces and thus enables the configuration of
two physically separated PROFINET segments. Up to 250 devices can be operated on each
PROFINET interface. Use of the CP 443-1 for PROFINET is not possible with the CPU 410.
The settings shown below apply to both H-systems and standard systems.
Q: What are the capabilities of the CPU 410 regarding PROFINET interfaces?
A1: The CPU 410 has two internal PN/Ethernet interfaces, allowing two separate PROFINET segments with up to 250 devices each.
A2: It supports two physically separated PROFINET segments, each accommodating up to 250 devices.
A3: With two PN/Ethernet interfaces, CPU 410 can configure two independent PROFINET networks of 250 devices.
A4: Enables configuration of two distinct PROFINET segments, each with a maximum of 250 devices.
A5: CPU 410's dual PN/Ethernet interfaces facilitate two separate PROFINET setups, 250 devices per segment.
